feed.title: Miklb’s Mindless Ramblings
feed.subtitle: Chronicling life in a digital world. Touching on web dev, food, and a little of everything in between.

entry.content: Been using Safari w/o Flash for a while now. Interesting to see HTML5 media players growth. Music player @npr really well done.
entry.summary: Been using Safari w/o Flash for a while now. Interesting to see HTML5 media players growth. Music player @npr really well done.

entry.content: “It's not the details themselves, it's the deliberate paying attention to them that makes the difference.” @ideasinfood http://blog.ideasinfood.com/ideas_in_food/2016/07/bone-in-striped-bass-loin.html

entry.content: Dawned on me today built my 1st web site (for a restaurant I was the chef at) 18 years ago. If me then could see the stuff I'm building now.
